function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Annual reinfection of up to 20% of people due to occupational risks","Impact":"Continued high rates of infection and transmission of contagious disease","Mitigation":"Implement targeted occupational safety measures and hygiene education","Technologies":"Occupational safety training programs, hygiene education materials","People":"People working in high-risk occupations","Owner":"Health organizations, local government"},{"Description":"Bureaucratic and institutional inflexibility leading to lack of tailored approaches","Impact":"Inability to address specific community needs and risks, potential for appropriation of resources","Mitigation":"Promote decentralized decision-making, empower local communities, and implement flexible management structures","Technologies":"Decentralized management tools, community engagement platforms","People":"Local community members, community leaders, health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, community organizations, health organizations"}]}
